title: Letters to Ex-Lovers: A Collection From Women
description: Ex-lovers live on in our hearts, minds, and imaginations long after the final conversation or intimate breath has been shared. This heartfelt compilation is filled with sent and unsent letters, poems, journal entries, and more, expressing the words that were left unsaid from the women who were brave enough to find them. This collection speaks to the confusing, enraging, unnerving, heart-opening, and growth-inducing process of relationships and especially their endings. With inspiring self awareness, these pieces give you plenty to think about. If you have been through a challenging breakup or are interested in a slice of feminine perspective, this book is for you.
author: Alison Schmidt
